name: Void Rifter XR
description:
Void Rifter is a dynamic, high speed mecha boomer shooter brought to you by Piece By Piece XR Development. Test your skills against other players in a high speed dynamic mech combat or hold your ground against waves of enemies and survive the horde.

  • Select from a range of tactical equipment to have an edge on your opponents ; 
  • Customize your mech using the in-game progression system, unlock more parts by playing more games (losing a match will still reward you with points, but winning will give you extra!) ; 
  • Play on a flat screen or in VR, supporting Pico neo 3, Oculus quest 2, Oculus Rift, Index, Vive, and more.

A product brought to you by Piece by Piece XR Development
